detectors.description:
MerkleDistributor.isClaimed(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#139-145) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- claimedWordIndex = index / 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#140)
	- claimedBitIndex = index % 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#141)
	- mask = (1 << claimedBitIndex) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#143)
	- claimedWord & mask == mask (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#144)

detectors.description:
MerkleDistributor.constructor(address,bytes32).token_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#134) lacks a zero-check on :
		- token = token_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#135)

Reentrancy in MerkleDistributor.claim(uint256,address,uint256,bytes32[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#153-165):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(IERC20(token).transfer(account,amount),MerkleDistributor: Transfer failed.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#162)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Claimed(index,account,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__3.sol#164)
